donor_4_letter:
2023-11-15

Mrs. Sarah Davis
101 Elm St, Anytown, USA

Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your generous gift of $250.00 to Community Impact Foundation on September 22, 2023. We're delighted to welcome you as a supporter of our organization, and your first gift makes you an important part of our community of donors.

Your donation to our Youth Programs helps provide safe spaces, mentorship, and enrichment activities for young people in our community. Because of supporters like you, we can expand after-school activities, leadership development, and positive experiences that equip teens with the confidence and skills they need to thrive.

We understand that you have teenage children who may be interested in volunteering. We would love to explore ways for them to become involved and experience firsthand the impact your gift is making.

Your contribution is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. No goods or services were provided in exchange for your generous donation.

With deepest gratitude,

Jane Doe
Development Director
Community Impact Foundation
jane.doe@communityimpact.org | 555-000-1111
donor_7_letter:
2023-11-15

Mr. James Wilson
404 Birch Rd, Anytown, USA

Dear Jim,

On behalf of Community Impact Foundation, I want to express our sincere gratitude for your donation of $150.00 received on September 30, 2023. Your continued support over the past 4 years demonstrates your commitment to our mission and has a compounding impact on our work.

Your gift to our Education Program will help provide learning materials, scholarships, and enrichment activities for students in underserved communities. As a school teacher, you know how transformative quality educational resources can be, and your generosity ensures that more students will have the tools they need to succeed.

Thank you for partnering with us to advance educational initiatives that inspire and empower young minds.

Your contribution is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. No goods or services were provided in exchange for your generous donation.

With sincere appreciation,

Jane Doe
Development Director
Community Impact Foundation
jane.doe@communityimpact.org | 555-000-1111
donor_12_letter:
2023-11-15

Mrs. Elizabeth Jackson
909 Oak Rd, Elsewhere, USA

Dear Elizabeth,

Your recent contribution of $5,000.00 to Community Impact Foundation on October 12, 2023 is deeply appreciated. Your leadership gift sets an inspiring example for others, and your continued generosity over the past 7 years has been nothing short of transformative.

Your gift to our Education Program will help provide learning materials, scholarships, and enrichment activities for students in underserved communities. As a former educator passionate about educational equity, your investment ensures that every learner—regardless of background—has access to high-quality educational opportunities that open doors to brighter futures.

Because of visionary donors like you, we are able to scale tutoring, mentorship, and college-readiness initiatives that equip thousands of students to reach their full potential. Thank you for empowering us to think boldly about the future of our programs.

Your contribution is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. No goods or services were provided in exchange for your generous donation.

With heartfelt thanks,

Jane Doe
Development Director
Community Impact Foundation
jane.doe@communityimpact.org | 555-000-1111
